attributes.title: Hellfire Rained Down
attributes.review: Terrible app would not get! I downloaded this app because I obviously wanted to support our dear president Trump. But when I opened this app, my phone immediately caught on fire. Priceless photos and memories gone in the fire. In surprise I dropped the flaming ball that was my phone onto a gas tank in my garage. A fiery explosion that rivaled the breath of Smaug consumed my house, my car, and all my earthly belongings. The fire spread around my neighborhood. The school next door burst into flames, raining burning papers across the town. Our small town is now completely destroyed, leaving thousands homeless. At least we donâ€™t have to worry about corona because we know thatâ€™s not real.  If you want to be happy, donâ€™t download this app, or you risk the same fate.

attributes.title: HORRIBLE APP.
attributes.review: This app is absolutely HORRID. I wanted to download the app to support our president, but the app took HOURS to download. When it FINALLY downloaded, it asked for so much personal information! The app makes my phone glitch to the point of it being UNUSABLE. No one should download this app. NO ONE. It will make your phone glitch, turn off, and even SET YOUR HOUSE ON FIRE. My sister downloaded the app and it overheated her phone so much that her curtains caught on FIRE, resulting in her house going in flames. On top of everything that happened, it gave me corona, gave my phone MILLION sources of porn (unwanted porn), and VIRUSES!! Now there is one more case of CORONA due to this app. I EVEN RECEIVED HERPES FROM THIS APP. This is an abomination of an app. If you value your life, privacy, and sanity, DO NOT DOWNLOAD.

attributes.title: Bad app
attributes.review: This app took a very long time to download and when the app has you put your phone number in I got texts and calls all night from unknown numbers. The has only fake news about trump to make him look good. Good thing I have a brain and donâ€™t believe everything I see in the Internet and I know about what this man has done in the past, so I know that these claims are false. Please do not download this app I do not like it one bit and the app could sell your personal information to telemarketers. Be aware of what Trump has done in the past and be aware that Trumps slogan is make America great again, which is admitting that while he was in office he did not make America great again but in fact made America worse.

attributes.title: HOW DARE YOU
attributes.review: Upon opening this seemingly helpless app, which I downloaded by accident, my eyes almost melted in my sockets and down my cheeks (which already were tear-stained). Why this suffering you ask? The first thing that comes up when you open the app is the devilâ€™s spawn himself, Lumpy Trumpy. My skin cells were so afraid of meeting the same spray-tan fate as Cheeto Puff Presidentâ€™s epidermis, that they retreated into my ears. I guess that was okay though because all of the extra skin cells in my ears kept me from hearing anything that came out of Donald J. Duckâ€™s mouth. If i had been able to hear anything that insufferable being said, my brain would have probably exploded, as it would not be able to process or contain the intolerable idiocy of lilâ€™ Trumpyâ€™s words. Delete this app now
